channel.title: ~ $oulScape Dev. Progress ~
channel.description:
[b]Introduction : [/b] [i]SoulScape is a 508 server that is being coded by a small development team. This server will consist of : PKing, Mini-Games, All Skills, Quests, and more. You want to see what's going to be added next or what already has been added? Well you came to the right thread.[/i]
[u]Features : [/u] [i]*Thieving ~Thieving is around the whole server. From Stall shops to Pickpocketing~ *Farming ~You can Grow/Plant your own Tree's/Herb's/Fruits&Veggie's at the Centre of home~ *Shops ~19 General Stores, 11 Misc. Shops~ *NPC Training ~Magic works on NPC, Proper Emotes/GFX/HP/Max Hits etc~ *NPC/Player following ~NPC Now follows player while attacked or the aggression of the NPC~ *Specials ~Special Attacks are 80% like Regular RS. Saradomin Special works perfect like regular RS~ *Economy ~The Economy of the server is almost like RuneScape's. You can make money by skilling/merchanting/quests or NPC Training~ [/i]
[b][i]Up-Coming Updates[/i][/b] [i]1* Player vs Player Combat[/i] [i]Progression : 70%[/i] - - --Proggression-- - - [i][b]1/24/09 : [s]Ranged Weapons[/s][/b][/i] [i]Shortbow's , Longbow's, Crossbow's, Ogrebow's, Compbow's are now working with proper projectile & effects.[/i] [i][b]1/24/09 : Magic Attacks[/b][/i] [i]*1st* Add correct Projectiles & GFX/Emotes to [u]ALL[/u] Magic Attacks.[/i]

item.title: ~ $oulScape Dev. Progress ~
item.dc:creator: @NotoriouzBoi NotoriouzBoi
item.description:
@NotoriouzBoi wrote:

Introduction :
SoulScape is a 508 server that is being coded by a small development team. This server will consist of :
PKing, Mini-Games, All Skills, Quests, and more. You want to see what’s going to be added next or what already has been added? Well you came to the right thread.

Features :
*Thieving
~Thieving is around the whole server. From Stall shops to Pickpocketing~
*Farming
~You can Grow/Plant your own Tree’s/Herb’s/Fruits&Veggie’s at the Centre of home~
*Shops
~19 General Stores, 11 Misc. Shops~
*NPC Training
~Magic works on NPC, Proper Emotes/GFX/HP/Max Hits etc~
*NPC/Player following
~NPC Now follows player while attacked or the aggression of the NPC~
*Specials
~Special Attacks are 80% like Regular RS. Saradomin Special works perfect like regular RS~
*Economy
~The Economy of the server is almost like RuneScape’s. You can make money by skilling/merchanting/quests or NPC Training~

Up-Coming Updates
1* Player vs Player Combat
Progression : 70%

  •                  -

–Proggression–

  •                  -

1/24/09 : Ranged Weapons
Shortbow’s , Longbow’s, Crossbow’s, Ogrebow’s, Compbow’s are now working with proper projectile & effects.
1/24/09 : Magic Attacks
1st Add correct Projectiles & GFX/Emotes to ALL Magic Attacks.

Read full topic
